Magnitude.description: How much the screen will constantly shake while within this volume.

Frequency.description: How frequently this continuous shaking will occur.

ZRot.description: How much the shaking should be rotated along the Z axis while within this volume.

Magnitude.description: How much the screen will shake periodically.

Frequency.description: How frequently each shake should occur while periodically shaking.

ZRot.description: How much the periodic shaking should be rotated along the Z axis.

ShakeTime.description: How long to shake before stopping for CycleTime.

CycleTime.description: How long to wait before shaking again.

Extra.value: A volume (not sure why this one is called a trigger) used in Null Space which causes the screen to SHAKEEE constantly, with a separate type of shake occurring periodically.
